content.html: refuse to lose the tweets from the best poster ever just because the worst poster ever shit his pants after a divorce. here it is: every @dril tweet in chronological order, up & free forever. please share. will continue to build it out for ease of use docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d…

refuse to lose the tweets from the best poster ever just because the worst poster ever shit his pants after a divorce.

here it is: every @dril tweet in chronological order, up & free forever. please share.
